featured.text: “Adam Joshua!” yelled Nelson, pushing away a basketball and shaking a toy frog off his foot.
Then, he stopped at Adam Joshua’s office, which happened to be unlocked, and walked away joyfully.

definition.zh_def: 約書亞：聖經中的一位人物，以色列的領袖，接替摩西帶領以色列人進入迦南地。
definition.en_def: Joshua: A biblical figure who succeeded Moses as the leader of the Israelites and led them into the Promised Land.
definition.example: Joshua led the Israelites across the Jordan River into Canaan.
